sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl,Validators,FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { hide = true; loginform=new FormGroup({ email:new FormControl('',[Validators.required,Validators.email]), password:new FormControl('',[Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(20),Validators.minLength(8)]) }) }

Login

Get access to your Orders, Wishlist and Recommendations

Enter your email
Enter your password
New to Flipkart? Create an account
